post_content.caption: Modi’s Full-Frontal Attack On Congress; Govinda’s Grand Return To Politics; BJP Poaches Six-Time MP
post_content.description:
MPrime Minister Narendra Modi launched a scathing attack on Congress after 600 lawyers wrote to the Chief Justice of India, alleging attempts to undermine the judiciary. Popular actor Govinda has returned to politics as he joined Maharashtra Chief Minister Eknath Shinde’s Shiv Sena ahead of Lok Sabha elections. Six-time BJD MP Bhartruhari Mahtab joined BJP in Odisha, days after he quit Naveen Patnaik’s party. Party-hopping has become the flavour of the season as general elections start next month.

post_content.caption: Russian Army Unit That Captured Avdiivka Honoured With 'Golden Star' By Putin's Minister | Watch
post_content.description:
Russia rewarded its armed forces for the capture of Avdiivka in Ukraine. The Defense Minister, Sergei Shoigu awarded the Center Group Commander with a "Golden Star". Russia captured Avdiivka last month, making it Moscow's most significant battleground gain since Bakhmut. Russia has now launched attacks on Kharkiv, Ukraine's second largest city. Watch the full video to know more.

post_content.caption: India Tells Biden Administration To 'Be Respectful' After U.S. Repeats Remarks On Kejriwal's Arrest
post_content.description:
India has strongly objected to the second U.S.' statement on the arrest of Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal. The Ministry of External Affairs described the comments as "unwarranted and unacceptable". MEA Spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal called on countries to be "respectful of the internal affairs of others". Watch for more.

post_content.caption: Dera Chief Of Uttarakhand's Nanakmatta Sahib Gurdwara Shot Dead
post_content.description:
Dera chief of the Baba Tarsem Singh was shot dead within the premises of the shrine by two bike-borne assailants in Uttarakhand on March 28. The Dera chief was sitting on a chair at around 6:30 am in the premises when two bike-borne assailants arrived and fired at him. Watch the video for details. 

#BabaTarsemSingh #DeraChief #Uttarakhand #NanakmattaSahibGurdwara #ViralVideo #BreakingNews

post_content.caption: NATO Nation Germany Admits 'U.S. Had Clues...Warned Russia' About Moscow Mall Attack | Details
post_content.description:
Germany denied having any prior information about the deadly attacks in Moscow. The German Chancellor, Olaf Scholz, pointed at U.S. and said Washington had "clues". Scholz added that U.S. even issued a public warning regarding the attack. Watch the full video to know more.

post_content.caption: Moscow Attack Bombshell: ISIS Hired Attackers Via Telegram Channel 'Sadoi Khuroson' | Report
post_content.description:
Russian news agency Ria Novosti has reported that the Moscow mall attackers were recruited by ISIS on a Telegram channel called 'Sadoi Khuroson.' The gunmen were a part of the Telegram group, which has now been deleted and was famous in Tajikistan. The Russian communications watchdog has restricted access to 11 Telegram channels over 'terrorist content' in the two days following the March 22 Crocus city concert hall attack that left 143 people dead and nearly 100 missing. Meanwhile, one of the gunmen arrested by Russia has appealed against his pre-trial detention. Watch for more details.

post_content.caption: Putin's Spy Chief Lands In U.S. 'Enemy' Nation After Moscow Mall Shooting Rampage | Details
post_content.description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin's foreign intelligence chief, Sergei Naryshkin, paid a visit to North Korea on March 25–27 to deepen bilateral cooperation between Moscow and Pyongyang. Russia's spy service said Naryshkin met North Korean Minister of State Security Ri Chang Dae to discuss issues of the development of the international situation, ensuring regional security, and deepening Russian-North Korean cooperation in the face of attempts to increase pressure from external forces, as per the SVR quoted by TASS. Watch
